purpose: To manage and orchestrate multiple AI agents for handling complex conversational tasks
principle: Builds on a modular architecture using Python, enabling the integration of various AI models and APIs like OpenAI and Anthropic for conversational AI
reusability: Provides a flexible API for integrating different AI agents and models, supports serverless deployment on AWS
limitations: Being in alpha, it may have stability issues and limited documentation; requires understanding of AWS services for deployment
name: agent-squad
description: Flexible and powerful framework for managing multiple AI agents and handling complex conversations
highlight: Comprehensive framework for orchestrating multiple AI agents to handle complex conversations with flexibility and scalability
